response.overview: Set in a fractured alien society on the brink of collapse, the story centers on a rebellious teenage fugitive torn between two worlds. As she unravels occult secrets buried in betrayal and power, she must confront inner demons and unlock the truth that could save—or doom—everything she loves. Blending philosophy, cultural myth, and emotional depth, Mothership is a bold meditation on hope, purpose, and redemption.
response.tagline: A stolen spaceship. A family secret. A rebellious teen fugitive...
response.title: Mothership
